title: Air Crash Data
description:
Description
Data on all fatal commercial airplane crashes from 1993–2015.
Excludes small planes (less than 6 passengers) and non-commercial (cargo, military, private) aircraft.
reference: Phase of the flight was cleaned by combining related variants, spelling, etc.

parameters.Fatalities: number of fatalities, a numeric vector
parameters.Cause: a factor with levels criminal human error mechanical unknown weather
parameters.Phase: phase of the flight, a factor with levels en route landing standing take-off unknown

format: A data frame with 439 observations on the following 5 variables.
